hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas Regime as Leading Indicator for Altcoin Rotation
hypothesis_content.statement: When Ethereum's 7-day average gas price falls below the 30th percentile of its 90-day distribution while BTC is in BULL regime, high-beta ETH ecosystem tokens (SOL, AVAX, GRT, CRV) will outperform ETH by 8-15% over the following 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas prices indicate reduced network congestion, making Ethereum L1 and L2 applications more usable. This improves fundamentals for ecosystem tokens before retail attention returns. Low gas often precedes developer activity surges.
entry_conditions: ETH 7d avg gas price < 30th percentile of 90-day window

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/ETH or AVAX/ETH ratio increases 12% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH continues to outperform its ecosystem tokens despite favorable gas conditions for 2+ weeks.
